--- title: "외생 변수 추가하기" date: 2025-07-12 categories: ["확률 통계", "시계열 분석"] --- ![](/img/stat-thumb.jpg){.post-thumbnail} ::: {#f2ce0dcf .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} import statsmodels.api as sm import pandas as pd import numpy as np import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import seaborn as sns plt.rcParams['font.family'] = 'Noto Sans KR' macro_econ_data = sm.datasets.macrodata.load_pandas().data macro_econ_data ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=1} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ::: {#5d0d6dfc .cell execution_count=2} ``` {.python .cell-code} target = macro_econ_data[['realgdp', 'realcons', 'realinv', 'realgovt', 'realdpi', 'cpi']] target.plot(subplots=True, figsize=(10, 8), layout=(3, 2)) plt.xticks(np.arange(0, 208, 16), np.arange(1959, 2010, 4)) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](07_files/figure-html/cell-3-output-1.png){width=809 height=633} ::: ::: - 이 다음 부분은 오류인거 같음. 다른 책 보자.
